recipes.startdescription: That brightness in the mist - is it the Sun? It might be unwise to gaze into it. [You can choose to forget almost everything you have learnt of this Skill - since you haven't yet committed it to the Tree of Wisdoms. You'll gain 15 Many-Faceted Lessons, one fewer than you spent to get this far... for though much abides, something is always taken. Many-Faceted Lessons can be used to upgrade any Skill, but always disappear at dawn.]
recipes.desc: [This skill is now level 1. Use your Many-Faceted Lessons wisely.]

recipes.comments: The readable tag locks out book reading, currently the only other way to see this recipe with this combo - but this isn't wildly stable and will probably resurface.
recipes.startdescription: This mist will pass. What will pass with it? [You can choose to forget everything you know of this Skill - since you haven't yet committed it to the Tree of Wisdoms. You'll gain a Many-Faceted Lesson, which can be used to upgrade any other skill, but which always disappears at dawn - and which cannot be used to regain your lost skill.]
